channel.title: PI npc nonattackable?
channel.description: how would you make an npc non attackable?

item.title: PI npc nonattackable?
item.dc:creator: @mr_pker01 mr pker01
item.description:
@mr_pker01 wrote:

Go Server files -> Date -> Cfg -> Npc.cfg

Then after that, you will see a “Combat” word. If it’s 0 you can’t attack it and it’s it’s 1 or above u can attack it
Example:

// NpcID NpcName combat health npc = 0 Hans 0 0 npc = 1 Man 2 7 npc = 2 Man 2 7 npc = 3 Man 2 7 npc = 4 Woman 2 7 npc = 5 Woman 2 7 npc = 6 Woman 2 7 npc = 7 Farmer 7 12 npc = 8 Thief 16 17 npc = 9 Guard 21 22 npc = 10 Guard 22 22 npc = 11 Tramp 2 7 npc = 12 Barbarian 7 14 npc = 13 Wizard 9 14 npc = 14 Druid 33 30 npc = 15 Warrior_woman 24 20 npc = 16 Man 2 7 npc = 17 Barbarian_woman 8 18 npc = 18 Al-Kharid_warrior 9 19

Hans can’t be attacked since his combat is 0

Read full topic
